data.title: Fantastic time with great friends!
data.text: Joined Linda and Carla's food tour with a group of friends and family and had a fantastic time! Great food, short walk and the company and knowledge shared of Oceanside was a blast! If you are a local or visiting we highly recommend booking a food tour- you will not regret it!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Unclemando7, we had a great time as well. Thanks for bringing everyone along :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Walk, eat, laugh
data.text: My wife and I visited Oceanside and spent the day with Carla and Linda on their amazing food tour. In addition to great food and drinks, we also learned a bit about the seaside town. Highly recommend for anyone who likes food and fun!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Stephan W. We had a great time with you and your wife. The whole group was awesome!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing!!
data.text: So fun! Great spots, great company!! Seriously go take this your!!! Food was amazing, drinks awesome too!!! You won't be sorry!!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Arania M. I am so happy that you enjoyed the food choices. It is great to know that my favorites have become your favorites too :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: If you do just one thing in Oceanside, choose this!
data.text:
I am at home  in the world of food. Anything from a crawfish boil or burgers on the grill with popsicles for dessert to Michelin Starred restaurants. I simply love food. I came across Carla and Linda's tour while looking for things to do while visiting my dad and stepmom in nearby Vista. Wow, did I strike foodie gold - or caviar if you wish! 
Linda went out of her way to accommodate us on a day that had no tours scheduled, happily arranging a tour us. I am still talking to everyone I know about what in unbelievable time we had! 4 restaurants ( started with dessert! I'm *always* down for that!) in 3 plus hours. Each place will blow you away with great food, but much more that that. You'll meet the chefs, learn of their backgrounds and cooking roots, find out the history of the  establishment and its role within the town. Clever, inventive food that's packed with flavor, some presented in great new ways. Linda and Carla are not only citizens of this town, they are part of the fabric of this developing, vibrant scene. Chefs, entrepreneurs, artists and musicians seems to be everywhere, all overlapping, relating, sharing and creating a warm, nurturing and creative city. When you are done with your tour, you will feel part of this, like an insider - not just in the foodie world of Oceanside, but all of it. 

Truly one of the most unique thing that I've had the pleasure of doing in any city. Yeah, you'll leave full, but also enriched by the experience, like you know a great new secret that you can't wait to share. 

Even if you *think *you know Oceanside, think again. Book a tour. It'll be the most fun you've had in a while. And probably the coolest thing in a long while!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Chris. I had an awesome time with you and your folks. I do look forward to your visit next year so we can do a different tour in Oceanside :) We have new restaurants joining us all of the time. I think you will be very excited by our new choices.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Walking Food Tour in Southern California
data.text:
Wow! We've seen some food tours before but this one takes the crown.
They are well organized, friendly, knowledgeable and have hand picked some of the best restaurants in Oceanside. All the restaurants we visited on the tour are all chef driven and the atmosphere at each location was extremely welcoming. This is defiantly a must thing to do when visiting Oceanside.

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Shawn. We actually have as much fun doing the tours as you do taking them. Thank you for joining us :) We hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious and fun ...something different
data.text: You really need to do this!!!  You choose the day you want and then Carla and Linda make all the arrangements. You will try foods from 4 different places over a 3 hour period. The restaurants are expecting you and have great food awaiting.  Drinks are on your own but know each place has beer and wines. We went with 2 other couples and had a great time and great food.  Will go back  again on a different day and try 4 different places!!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Patty :) We had a great time with you all and look forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Afternoon in Oceanside!
data.text: If you want to try four great local eateries, and not worry about parking, reservations, and be well taken care of...Carla and Linda have done an outstanding job putting together a very enjoyable walking food tour!  We went on the “Heart of Oceanside Tour” and had a fantastic afternoon of light walking, eating some incredible food, relaxing and some of us partaking in wonderful crafted beer, or hand picked wine.  Our tour guild was friendly, knowledgeable and even surprised some of us locals with more information about the city we love.  All this in a short 1 ½ mile round trip on a gorgeous day with ocean breezes.  I can’t wait to try their other tours!

owner_response.author: walkingfoodtour, Owner at Carla and Linda's Walking Food Tours, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Carolyn for the review. It was great having your friends and family on the tour. We look forward to seeing you on other tours :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response
